none: Games appear in order: Northwestern vs. Notre Dame, September 19, 1970, home game, final score: NU 14, ND 35. Northwestern vs. UCLA, September 26, 1970, Los Angeles, California final score: NU 7, UCLA 12. Northwestern vs. SMU, October 3, 1970, home game, final score: NU 20, SMU 21. Northwestern vs. Illinois, October 10, 1970, home game, final score: NU 48, Illinois 0. Northwestern vs Wisconsin, October 17, 1970, Madison, Wisconsin, finale score: NU 24, Wisconsin 14. Northwestern vs. Purdue, October 24, 1970, home game, final score: NU 38, Purdue 14. Northwestern vs. Ohio State, October 31, 1970, Columbus, Ohio, final score: NU 10, Ohio State 24. Northwestern vs. Minnesota, November 6, 1970, home game, final score: NU 28, Minnesota 14. Northwestern vs. Indiana, November 14, 1970, Bloomington, Indiana, final score: NU 21, Indiana 7. Northwestern vs. Michigan State, November 21, 1970, East Lansing, Michigan, final score: NU 23, Michigan State 20. Coach for the 1970 season: Alex Agase.

The video recordings on this web site are from material in the collections of the University Archives of Northwestern University Libraries, are provided for use by its students, faculty and staff, and by other researchers visiting this site, for research consultation and scholarly purposes only. Further distribution and/or any commercial use of the video recordings from this site is not permitted.
Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections API
Homepage at Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections

This collection of Northwestern University football films dates between 1929 and 1984 with a gap for the period 1932â€“1934. The films record actual intercollegiate games although for many seasons not all contests are represented. The films are most complete for football seasons from the 1950s through the 1980s; beginning in the late 1950s, practice, junior varsity, and freshman team game films often are included. Northwestern team and Big Ten Conference football highlight films are scattered across the collection from the 1930s through the 1970s.
